TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListener extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class HttpListener Implements IDisposable
public ref class HttpListener sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供簡單、以程式設計方式控制的 HTTP 通訊協定接聽程式。

span.span: Provides a simple, programmatically controlled HTTP protocol listener.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，您可以建立簡單的 HTTP 通訊協定接聽程式以回應 HTTP 要求。Using the class, you can create a simple HTTP protocol listener that responds to HTTP requests. 接聽程式均可使用的存留期物件，並以其權限的應用程式中執行。The listener is active for the lifetime of the object and runs within your application with its permissions. 若要使用，建立使用類別的新執行個體建構函式和使用屬性來存取保存字串，其中指定的統一資源識別元 (URI) 的集合做為前置詞應該處理。To use , create a new instance of the class using the constructor and use the property to gain access to the collection that holds the strings that specify which Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefixes the should process. URI 的前置詞字串是由配置 （http 或 https）、 主機、 選用連接埠和選擇性路徑所組成。A URI prefix string is composed of a scheme (http or https), a host, an optional port, and an optional path. 完整的前置詞字串的範例是* http://www.contoso.com:8080/customerData/ *。An example of a complete prefix string is *http://www.contoso.com:8080/customerData/*. 前置詞必須結尾斜線 （"/"）。Prefixes must end in a forward slash ("/"). 回應要求最符合要求的 URI 前置詞的物件。The object with the prefix that most closely matches a requested URI responds to the request. 多個物件無法加入相同的前置詞;擲回例外狀況如果新增已經在前置詞使用。Multiple objects cannot add the same prefix; a exception is thrown if a adds a prefix that is already in use. 指定連接埠時，裝載項目都可以使用取代"\*"表示接受要求傳送至連接埠，如果要求的 URI 不符合任何前置詞。When a port is specified, the host element can be replaced with "\*" to indicate that the accepts requests sent to the port if the requested URI does not match any other prefix. 比方說，若要接收的所有要求傳送至連接埠 8080 當要求的 URI 不由處理任何，前置詞是*http://\*: 8080 /*。For example, to receive all requests sent to port 8080 when the requested URI is not handled by any , the prefix is *http://\*:8080/*. 同樣地，以指定接受連接埠，傳送的所有要求的主機項目取代為"+"字元。Similarly, to specify that the accepts all requests sent to a port, replace the host element with the "+" character. For example, *https://+:8080*.For example, *https://+:8080*. 「\*"和"+"字元可出現在 包含路徑的前置詞。The "\*" and "+" characters can be present in prefixes that include paths. .NET Core 2.0 或 Windows 10 上的.NET Framework 4.6 起，萬用字元子網域中支援所管理的 URI 前置詞物件。Starting with .NET Core 2.0 or .NET Framework 4.6 on Windows 10, wildcard subdomains are supported in URI prefixes that are managed by an object. 若要指定萬用字元子網域，請使用"\*"字元的 URI 前置詞中的主機名稱的一部分。To specify a wildcard subdomain, use the "\*" character as part of the hostname in a URI prefix. 例如， *http://\*.foo.com/*。For example, *http://\*.foo.com/*. 將此變數傳遞做為引數方法。Pass this as the argument to the method. 這適用於.NET Core 2.0 或 Windows 10; 上的.NET Framework 4.6 為準，在舊版中，這會產生。This works as of .NET Core 2.0 or .NET Framework 4.6 on Windows 10; in earlier versions, this generates an . > [!WARNING] > 最上層的萬用字元繫結 (*http://\*: 8080 /*和\* http://+:8080 \*) 應該**不**使用。Top-level wildcard bindings (*http://\*:8080/* and *http://+:8080*) should **not** be used. 最上層萬用字元繫結可能暴露您的應用程式安全性弱點。Top-level wildcard bindings can open up your app to security vulnerabilities. 這對強式與弱式萬用字元皆適用。This applies to both strong and weak wildcards. 請使用明確主機名稱，而非萬用字元。Use explicit host names rather than wildcards. 若您擁有整個父網域 (與具弱點的 `*.com` 相對) 的控制權，則子網域萬用字元繫結 (例如 `*.mysub.com`) 就沒有此安全性風險。Subdomain wildcard binding (for example, `*.mysub.com`) doesn't have this security risk if you control the entire parent domain (as opposed to `*.com`, which is vulnerable). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [rfc7230 5.4 節](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7230#section-5.4)。See [rfc7230 section-5.4](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7230#section-5.4) for more information. 若要開始接聽來自用戶端的要求，將 URI 前置詞加入至集合並呼叫方法。To begin listening for requests from clients, add the URI prefixes to the collection and call the method. 提供同步和非同步模式，處理用戶端要求。 offers both synchronous and asynchronous models for processing client requests. 要求和其相關聯的回應則使用存取所傳回物件方法或其非同步對應項目和方法。Requests and their associated responses are accessed using the object returned by the method or its asynchronous counterparts, the and methods. 如果您的應用程式應該要封鎖等候用戶端要求時，如果您想要一次處理一個要求適合同步模型。The synchronous model is appropriate if your application should block while waiting for a client request and if you want to process only one request at a time. 使用同步的模型時，呼叫方法，等待用戶端傳送要求。Using the synchronous model, call the method, which waits for a client to send a request. 方法會傳回物件要處理時，就會發生。The method returns an object to you for processing when one occurs. 在更複雜的非同步模型中，您的應用程式不會封鎖同時等候要求和每個要求在它自己的執行緒中處理。In the more complex asynchronous model, your application does not block while waiting for requests and each request is processed in its own execution thread. 使用方法，以指定應用程式定義要呼叫的方法為每個連入要求。Use the method to specify an application-defined method to be called for each incoming request. 該方法內呼叫方法來取得要求、 處理它，並回應。Within that method, call the method to obtain the request, process it, and respond. 在這兩種模式中，連入要求會使用存取屬性且由物件。In either model, incoming requests are accessed using the property and are represented by objects. 同樣地，使用存取回應屬性且由物件。Similarly, responses are accessed using the property and are represented by objects. 這些物件共用的某些功能和物件，而第二個物件不能搭配因為它們實作用戶端、 不伺服器、 行為。These objects share some functionality with the and objects, but the latter objects cannot be used in conjunction with because they implement client, not server, behaviors. 可以要求用戶端驗證。An can require client authentication. 您可以指定要用於驗證特定配置，或者您可以指定委派，會決定要使用的配置。You can either specify a particular scheme to use for authentication, or you can specify a delegate that determines the scheme to use. 您必須要求某種形式的驗證，以取得用戶端身分識別的相關資訊。You must require some form of authentication to obtain information about the client's identity. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱， ，和屬性。For additional information, see the , , and properties. > [!NOTE] > 如果您建立使用 https，您必須選取伺服器憑證該接聽項。If you create an using https, you must select a Server Certificate for that listener. 否則，這個查詢會失敗，意外的關閉的連接。Otherwise, an query of this will fail with an unexpected close of the connection. > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用網路殼層 (netsh.exe)，來設定伺服器憑證和其他接聽程式選項。You can configure Server Certificates and other listener options by using Network Shell (netsh.exe). 請參閱[網路殼層 (Netsh)](/windows-server/networking/technologies/netsh/netsh)如需詳細資訊。See [Network Shell (Netsh)](/windows-server/networking/technologies/netsh/netsh) for more details. 可執行檔開始隨附於 Windows Server 2008 和 Windows Vista。The executable began shipping with Windows Server 2008 and Windows Vista. > [!NOTE] > 如果您指定多個驗證配置，接聽程式是以下列順序的用戶端的挑戰： `Negotiate`， `NTLM`， `Digest`，然後`Basic`。If you specify multiple authentication schemes for the , the listener will challenge clients in the following order: `Negotiate`, `NTLM`, `Digest`, and then `Basic`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用。The following code example demonstrates using a . [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前使用此建構函式所傳回的執行個體，您必須叫用其方法。Before using the instance returned by this constructor, you must invoke its method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式來建立新物件。The following code example demonstrates using the constructor to create a new object. 完整的範例，請參閱類別主題。For the complete example, see the class topic. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Abort() cil managed

summary.span: 立即關閉 物件，並捨棄所有目前排入佇列的要求。

span.span: Shuts down the object immediately, discarding all currently queued requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會處置此接聽程式所持有的所有資源。This method disposes of all resources held by this listener. 任何暫止要求都無法完成。Any pending requests are unable to complete. 之後呼叫這個方法，您會收到如果您嘗試使用這個。After calling this method, you will receive an if you attempt to use this . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::AuthenticationSchemes AuthenticationSchemes { System::Net::AuthenticationSchemes get(); void set(System::Net::AuthenticationSchemes value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用來驗證用戶端的配置。

span.span: Gets or sets the scheme used to authenticate clients.

value.span: 列舉值的位元組合，表示用戶端的驗證方式。

span.span: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates how clients are to be authenticated.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用指定的配置來驗證所有連入要求。The uses the specified scheme to authenticate all incoming requests. 和方法才會傳回傳入的用戶端要求順利通過驗證的要求。The and methods return an incoming client request only if the successfully authenticates the request. 您可以使用查閱成功驗證的用戶端的身分識別屬性。You can interrogate the identity of a successfully authenticated client by using the property. 如果您想物件以使用不同的驗證機制會根據所接收的要求特性 (例如，要求的或屬性)，您必須實作選擇的方法驗證配置。If you want an object to use different authentication mechanisms based on characteristics of the requests it receives (for example, the request's or property), you must implement a method that chooses the authentication scheme. 如需有關如何執行這項操作的指示，請參閱屬性文件。For instructions about how to do this, see the property documentation. > [!NOTE] > 若要設定這個屬性，以啟用 Digest，NTLM 或交涉需要， 。To set this property to enable Digest, NTLM, or Negotiate requires the , . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定驗證配置。The following code example demonstrates using the property to specify an authentication scheme. [!code-csharp[Net_listener_Basic#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#14)]

span.span: This object has been closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::AuthenticationSchemeSelector ^ AuthenticationSchemeSelectorDelegate { System::Net::AuthenticationSchemeSelector ^ get(); void set(System::Net::AuthenticationSchemeSelector ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定委派，呼叫這個委派可決定用來驗證用戶端的通訊協定。

span.span: Gets or sets the delegate called to determine the protocol used to authenticate clients.

value.span: 委派，叫用用來選取驗證通訊協定的方法。

span.span: An delegate that invokes the method used to select an authentication protocol.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果您想要用於特定的執行個體所處理的所有要求相同的驗證通訊協定，您不需要設定此屬性。If you want the same authentication protocol to be used for all requests handled by a particular instance of , you do not need to set this property. 若要指定要用於所有用戶端要求的通訊協定，使用屬性。To specify a protocol to be used for all client requests, use the property. 如果用戶端沒有在其標頭，指定驗證資訊呼叫指定的每個未驗證的傳入要求，來判斷，如果有的話，要使用通訊協定來驗證用戶端的委派。If the client has not specified authentication information in its headers, the calls the specified delegate for each unauthenticated incoming request to determine which, if any, protocol to use to authenticate the client. 和方法會傳回傳入的要求才成功驗證要求。The and methods return an incoming request only if the successfully authenticated the request. 如果無法驗證要求，自動傳送回去 401 回應。If a request cannot be authenticated, the automatically sends back a 401 response. 您可以取得已成功驗證用戶端使用的身分識別屬性。You can get the identity of a successfully authenticated client using the property. 委派的驗證通訊協定的應用程式專屬方法來選擇適合您想要的執行個體使用不同的驗證通訊協定會根據它所收到 （要求的特性例如，要求的或屬性)。The ability to delegate the choice of authentication protocol to an application-specific method is useful if you want an instance of to use different authentication protocols depending on the characteristics of the requests it receives (for example, the request's or property). > [!NOTE] > 若要設定這個屬性，以啟用 Digest，NTLM 或交涉需要， 。To set this property to enable Digest, NTLM, or Negotiate requires the , . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性的值。The following code example sets the value of this property. [!code-csharp[NclListener#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NclListener#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例提供叫用方法的實作委派。The following code example provides an implementation of a method invoked by an delegate. [!code-csharp[NclListener#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NclListener#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLListener/vb/sample.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginGetContext (AsyncCallback callback, object state);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.IAsyncResult BeginGetContext(class System.AsyncCallback callback, object state) cil managed
Public Function BeginGetContext (callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginGetContext(AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: callback
param.span: 委派，有用戶端要求時，它會參考要叫用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when a client request is available.

param.name: state
param.span: 使用者定義物件，包含作業的相關資訊。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給「回呼」委派。

span.span: This object is passed to the callback delegate when the operation completes.

summary.span: 開始非同步擷取傳入要求。

span.span: Begins asynchronously retrieving an incoming request.

returns.span: 物件，表示非同步作業的狀態。

span.span: An object that indicates the status of the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法開始的非同步 （非封鎖） 呼叫接收內送的用戶端要求。The method begins an asynchronous (non-blocking) call to receive incoming client requests. 之前呼叫這個方法，您必須呼叫方法並加入至少一個統一資源識別元 (URI) 前置詞加 URI 字串，以接聽傳回屬性。Before calling this method, you must call the method and add at least one Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the returned by the property. 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`callback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate. 在作業完成時，這個方法不會封鎖。This method does not block while the operation completes. 若要取得連入要求和區塊的作業完成之前，呼叫方法。To get an incoming request and block until the operation completes, call the method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以指定將會處理內送的用戶端要求的回呼方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method to specify a callback method that will handle incoming client requests. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#12)] 下列程式碼範例會實作回呼方法。The following code example implements a callback method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#13)]

span.span: Check the exception's property to determine the cause of the exception.

exception.span: 這個物件尚未啟動或目前已停止。

span.span: This object has not been started or is currently stopped.
This object is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Close() cil managed

summary.span: 關閉 。

span.span: Shuts down the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後呼叫這個方法，您無法再使用物件。After calling this method, you can no longer use the object. 若要暫時暫停物件，請使用方法。To temporarily pause an object, use the method. 這個方法關閉清單物件，而不處理要求排入佇列。This method shut downs the object without processing queued requests. 任何暫止要求都無法完成。Any pending requests are unable to complete. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DefaultServiceNames As ServiceNameCollection

summary.span: 取得由已註冊前置詞所決定之服務提供者名稱 (SPN) 的預設清單。

span.span: Gets a default list of Service Provider Names (SPNs) as determined by registered prefixes.
A that contains a list of SPNs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性搭配整合式 Windows 驗證以提供延伸的保護。The property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection. Spn 的清單初始化自屬性時存取並清除 加入新的前置詞時屬性。The list of SPNs is initialized from the property when accessed and cleared when new prefixes are added to the property. 屬性使用應用程式不會設定其延伸的保護原則上的屬性。The property is used if an application doesn't set the property on its extended protection policy. ，會擷取與屬性從建置屬性根據下列規則：The that is retrieved with the property is built from the property according to the following rules: 1. 如果主機名稱為"+""*"，或 IPv4 或 IPv6 常值 (相當於"\*"但限制為特定的本機介面)，加入下列的 SPN:If the hostname is "+", "*", or an IPv4 or IPv6 literal (equivalent to "\*" but restricted to a specific local interface), the following SPN is added: `"HTTP/"` 加上電腦的完整的網域名稱。`"HTTP/"` plus the fully qualified domain name of the computer. 1. 如果主機名稱不包含句點 （沒有網域或子網域），嘗試使用 DNS 完整網域名稱解析 (使用相同的行為)。If the hostname contains no dots (no domains or subdomains), an attempt is made to resolve the fully-qualified domain name using DNS (the same behavior used by ). 如果可以解析的完整網域名稱，則會加入下列的 Spn:If the fully-qualified domain name can be resolved, the following SPNs are added: `"HTTP/"` 加上的主機名稱 （簡短名稱）。`"HTTP/"` plus the hostname (the short name). `"HTTP/"` 加上主機名稱的完整的網域名稱。`"HTTP/"` plus the fully qualified domain name for the hostname. 1. 如果主機名稱包含不點 （沒有網域或子網域），而無法解析完整網域名稱，則會加入下列的 SPN:If the hostname contains not dots (no domains or subdomains) and a fully-qualified domain name can't be resolved, the following SPN is added: `"HTTP/"` 加上主機名稱。`"HTTP/"` plus the hostname. 1. 如果主機名稱包含句點 （網域或子網域），則會加入下列的 SPN:If the hostname contains dots (domains or subdomains), the following SPN is added: `"HTTP/"` 加上主機名稱。`"HTTP/"` plus the hostname. 屬性可以由應用程式用來檢閱清單，如果未不提供任何自訂的清單會用於驗證的預設 spn。The property can be used by an application to review the list of default SPNs which will be used for authentication if no custom list is supplied. 如需其他 Spn，應用程式可以將它們使用其中一種方法。If other SPNs are needed, an application can add them using one of the methods. 使用延伸的保護原則決策依據要求的 URL，因為這可能會被欺騙時，它並不安全。It is not safe when using extended protection to make policy decisions based on the requested URL, since this can be spoofed. 相反地，應用程式應該會仰賴或屬性，使這類原則決策。Rather, applications should rely on the or properties to make such policy decisions.

param.span: 啟動非同步作業時所取得的 物件。

span.span: An object that was obtained when the asynchronous operation was started.

summary.span: 完成擷取傳入用戶端要求的非同步作業。

span.span: Completes an asynchronous operation to retrieve an incoming client request.
An object that represents the client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法時，通常出現在應用程式定義的回呼方法的委派中，以取得所叫用物件，包含傳入的用戶端要求和其相關聯的回應。The method is called, usually within an application-defined callback method invoked by a delegate, to obtain the object that contains an incoming client request and its associated response. 這個方法完成作業，藉由呼叫先前已啟動方法。This method completes an operation previously started by calling the method. 如果作業尚未完成，這個方法會封鎖，直到它執行。If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does. 因為呼叫方法需要物件，這個物件通常會傳遞至回呼方法的使用狀態物件傳遞至方法。Because calling the method requires the object, this object is typically passed into a callback method by using the state object passed into the method. 您可以使用，以取得此狀態物件屬性`asyncResult`物件。You can obtain this state object by using the property of the `asyncResult` object. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範呼叫的回呼方法的實作方法。The following code example shows the implementation of a callback method that calls the method. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#13)]

span.span: was not obtained by calling the method.
is .

This object is closed.

span.span: A that specifies the policy to use for extended protection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性搭配整合式 Windows 驗證以提供延伸的保護。The property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection. 屬性所允許的延伸的保護原則，為整個組態工作階段。The property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for the whole session. 屬性所允許的每個要求的延伸的保護原則設定。The property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for each individual request. 屬性必須為 `null`。The property must be `null`. 執行個體直接從自己的 TLS 工作階段取得通道繫結權杖 (CBT) 有一個。The instance gets the Channel Binding Token (CBT) directly from its own TLS session if there is one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性搭配整合式 Windows 驗證以提供延伸的保護。The property is used with integrated Windows authentication to provide extended protection. 屬性所允許的延伸的保護原則，為整個組態工作階段。The property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy for the whole session. 屬性所允許的每個個別要求的延伸的保護原則設定。The property allows the configuration of the extended protection policy per individual request. 屬性必須為 `null`。The property must be `null`. 執行個體直接從自己的 TLS 工作階段取得通道繫結權杖 (CBT) 有一個。The instance gets the Channel Binding Token (CBT) directly from its own TLS session if there is one. 針對每個要求中，委派可以選擇的設定，執行個體會使用提供延伸的保護。For each request, the delegate can choose the settings that the instance will use to provide extended protection. 如果委派傳回`null`對於這個屬性，這代表其中屬性設定為。If a delegate returns `null` for this property, this represents a which the property set to .

span.span: Waits for an incoming request and returns when one is received.
An object that represents a client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前呼叫這個方法，您必須呼叫方法並加入至少一個接聽所加入的 URI 字串的 URI 前置詞傳回屬性。Before calling this method, you must call the method and add at least one URI prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the returned by the property. 前置詞的詳細說明，請參閱類別概觀。For a detailed description of prefixes, see the class overview. 這個方法會封鎖等候傳入要求。This method blocks while waiting for an incoming request. 如果您想要進行處理以非同步方式 （在個別執行緒上） 中，以供您的應用程式不會封鎖連入要求，請使用方法。If you want incoming requests to be processed asynchronously (on separate threads) so that your application does not block, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件將會完成時收到內送要求。The returned object will complete when the incoming request has been received. 之前呼叫這個方法，您必須呼叫方法並加入至少一個接聽所加入的 URI 字串的 URI 前置詞傳回屬性。Before calling this method, you must call the method and add at least one URI prefix to listen for by adding the URI strings to the returned by the property. 前置詞的詳細說明，請參閱類別概觀。For a detailed description of prefixes, see the class overview.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Realm { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定與這個 物件關聯的領域 (或資源分割)。

span.span: Gets or sets the realm, or resource partition, associated with this object.

value.span: 值，包含與 物件關聯的領域名稱。

span.span: A value that contains the name of the realm associated with the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 伺服器使用領域來分割受保護的資源;每個資料分割可以有自己的驗證配置和 （或） 授權資料庫。Servers use realms to partition protected resources; each partition can have its own authentication scheme and/or authorization database. 領域只限於基本和摘要式驗證使用。Realms are used only for basic and digest authentication. 當用戶端成功驗證之後，驗證對指定領域中的所有資源都有效。After a client successfully authenticates, the authentication is valid for all resources in a given realm. 領域的詳細說明，請參閱 RFC 2617 在[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org)。For a detailed description of realms, see RFC 2617 at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org). 執行個體有只有一個相關聯的領域。An instance of has only one associated realm. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting the property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#10)]

span.span: This object has been closed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Start() cil managed

summary.span: 允許這個執行個體接收傳入要求。

span.span: Allows this instance to receive incoming requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須呼叫這個方法，才能呼叫或方法。This method must be called before you call the or method. 啟動之後物件，您可以使用方法可加以停止。After you have started an object, you can use the method to stop it. > [!NOTE] > 如果此接聽程式執行個體使用 https，您必須安裝並選取 伺服器憑證。If this listener instance uses https, you must install and select a Server Certificate. 否則，這個查詢會失敗，意外的關閉的連接。Otherwise, an query of this will fail with an unexpected close of the connection. 您可以使用 HttpCfg.exe 來設定伺服器憑證和其他接聽程式選項。You can configure Server Certificates and other listener options by using HttpCfg.exe. 請參閱[ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp)如需詳細資訊。See [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/http/http/httpcfg_exe.asp) for more details. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法開始處理傳入要求。The following code example demonstrates using the method to begin processing incoming requests. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#12)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，控制使用 NTLM 時，是否必須驗證其他使用相同傳輸控制通訊協定 (TCP) 連接的要求。

span.span: if the of the first request will be used for subsequent requests on the same connection; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`透過特定的 TCP 連接的第一個要求會使用 NTLM 進行驗證，透過相同的 TCP 連線的後續要求將會使用處理的驗證資訊 () 的初始要求。When this property is set to `true` and the first request over a particular TCP connection is authenticated using NTLM, subsequent requests over the same TCP connection are processed using the authentication information () of the initial request. 當 NTLM 不是驗證通訊協定時，這個屬性不會有任何作用。This property has no effect when NTLM is not the authentication protocol. 做為驗證通訊協定指定交涉時，這個屬性才 NTLM 是實際的通訊協定用於驗證，就會有效果。When Negotiate is specified as the authentication protocol, this property has an effect only if NTLM is the actual protocol used for authentication. > [!NOTE] > 若要設定這個屬性時`true`可提升效能，因為不傳送其他 NTLM 驗證挑戰，不需要提供驗證資訊的所有要求中有安全性風險。While setting this property to `true` increases performance because the does not send additional NTLM authentication challenges, there is a security risk in not requiring all requests to provide authentication information. 您必須決定是否值得冒這個風險以提升效能。You must determine whether the increase in performance is worth this risk. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates setting this property. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#14)]

span.span: This object has been closed.
